org.sd.nlp
Interface Lexicon

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLexicon, AmPmLexicon, ConjugationLexicon, DateTimeNumberLexicon, DigitLexicon, GenericLexicon, HasDigitLexicon, LexiconImpl, LexiconPipeline, TrieLexicon, WordLexicon, WordNetLexicon
public interface Lexicon

Interface for getting the categories for a String.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 Normalizer getNormalizer()
          Get the normalizer that applies to this lexicon.
 void lookup(StringWrapper.SubString subString)
          Look up the categories for a subString, adding definition that apply.
 int maxNumWords()
          Get the maximum number of words in terms defined by this lexicon.
 

Method Detail

lookup

void lookup(StringWrapper.SubString subString)
Look up the categories for a subString, adding definition that apply.

Parameters:
subString - The subString to lookup categories for.

getNormalizer

Normalizer getNormalizer()
Get the normalizer that applies to this lexicon.

Returns:
this lexicon's normalizer. null when no normalization occurs.

maxNumWords

int maxNumWords()
Get the maximum number of words in terms defined by this lexicon.

Returns:
the maximum number of words or 0 for unlimited.
